snippet.title: DON'T SHOOT the Most Realistic Game You Can Actually Play  #unrealengine #dontshoot
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now ! : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2674870/DONT_SHOOT/

⭐ DON'T SHOOT is a tactical survival shooter where players can expect an immersive and narrative experience. DON'T SHOOT offers innovative game mechanics, a unique shooting system, an ultra developed AI. DON'T SHOOT' scenario can be compared to a documentary on the daily work of police or military . The player will have to try to survive as long as possible against hordes of infected of all kinds. The plot and presentation of the game will be at the heart of the gaming experience, and players can anticipate a range of gameplay sequences as well as many twists and turns. ⭐

DON'T SHOOT will be available to PC on Steam the 1st december 2023 !

We can play to our another games awaiting this game :
(https://store.steampowered.com/app/2565960/Only_Up_Rising/) 

In DON'T SHOOT, as you work on solving a complex case, you will need to use your tactical and detective skills to succeed. Between thugs, infected and allies, don’t shoot too fast ! Who knows ?...

#unrealengine #dontshoot #videogames #gaming #readyornot #camera #bodycam
